subject: Music
title: The Great Migration and Jazz
description: Learn The Great Migration and Jazz in one minute.

hook.text: Six million Black Americans moved north â€” and they brought jazz with them.

buildup.text: Between 1910 and 1970, the Great Migration reshaped American cities and culture.

discovery.text: Chicago and New York became new jazz capitals as southern musicians relocated.

twist.text: In Harlem, jazz became the soundtrack of the first major Black cultural renaissance.

climax.text: Jazz evolved from local folk music to America's most sophisticated art form.

punchline.text: Jazz migrated north and came back as high art.

quiz.question: How did the Great Migration affect jazz?
options: It spread jazz from New Orleans to Chicago, New York, and beyond
It kept jazz confined to the South
